DOC.brief_summary: In prospective , randomize , clinical trial , investigated effect ketamine-based remifentanil-based anesthetic protocol perioperative serum cystatin-c level , creatinine and/or cystatin-c base eGFR equation term acute kidney injury CABG surgery.This study approve Ethics Committee Hospital patient inform give write consent . Patients schedule elective CABG cardiopulmonary bypass . Patients randomly allocate anesthesia remifentanil-propofol-midazolam ( RPM ) group ketamine-propofol-midazolam ( KPM ) group . Blood sample obtain induction anesthesia ( baseline ) , end operation , postoperative day 1 , 2 , 4 .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Effects Ketamine Remifentanil Serum Cystatin-c Levels CABG Surgery
DOC.criteria: patient undergo elective CABG cardiopulmonary bypass patient undergoing emergency operation , combine operation , offpump surgery , repeat surgery valve surgery , patient present chronic kidney disease renal impairment , patient young 18 year old neurological and/or psychiatric disturbance .
